name: Shelldon
description:
Controls:

A/D - Left/Right

Space - Jump 

Space (Twice) - Double Jump

Why did I make this game?

This is a fun game I created as part of my studies. I created all of the sprites for the game using vector with the exception of the main character. I have been studying games design for just over a year.

Game Engine:

I used Unity to create this game.
